Class GraphMidMouseEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.piccolo2d.event.PInputEventListener

    public class GraphMidMouseEventHandler
extends org.piccolo2d.event.PPanEventHandler
    GraphMidMouseEventHandler class Implements the panning of the graph based on a mouse mid-click
    Author:
    sizuest

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphMidMouseEventHandler()
      Constructor Only thing to be done here is to set an PPanEventHandler only listening to a mid-click event
